submission:
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        # and 子数组
        n = len(nums)
        # dp[i] = Counter()
        # 到第i位与值为key，有t个
        ldp = Counter()

        res = 0
        for num in nums:
            dp = Counter()
            dp[num] += 1
            for lnum,lt in ldp.items():
                dp[num&lnum] += lt
            res += dp[k]
            ldp = dp

        return res
